comment.author: 92284803@N00
comment._content: The New York Times has several references to a "Jeanette McAlpin" in its social pages from around 1914. She is the granddaughter of David Hunter McAlpin, a 19th century industrialist from New York. Her father, George L McAlpin, was a prominent hotel owner in New York City.

comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: She married in 1914, see New-York tribune., April 23, 1914, Page 9, column 1
